sentences.title: Argentina at the FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: This is a record of Argentina's results at the FIFA World Cup.

sentences.title: Argentina at the FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: Argentina is one of the most successful teams in the tournament's history, having won three World Cups: in 1978, 1986, and 2022.

sentences.title: Argentina at the FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: Argentina has also been runner-up three times: in 1930, 1990 and 2014.

sentences.title: Argentina at the FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: In 18 World Cup tournaments, Argentina has 47 victories in 88 matches.

sentences.title: Argentina at the FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The team was present in all but four of the World Cups, being behind only Brazil and Germany in number of appearances.

sentences.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: The 2022 FIFA World Cup final was the final match of the 2022 FIFA World Cup, the 22nd edition of FIFA's competition for men's national football teams.

sentences.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: The match was played at Lusail Stadium in Lusail, Qatar, on 18 December 2022, the Qatari National Day, and was contested by Argentina and defending champions France.

sentences.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: With a record 1.5 billion people watching on television, the final became one of the most widely watched televised sporting events in history.

sentences.title: 1978 FIFA World Cup

sentences.title: 1978 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: It was held in Argentina between 1 and 25 June.

sentences.title: List of FIFA World Cup hosts

sentences.title: List of FIFA World Cup hosts

sentences.title: List of FIFA World Cup hosts
sentences.sentence_text: The choice of location was controversial in the earliest tournaments, given the three-week boat journey between South America and Europe, the two centers of strength in football at the time.

sentences.title: 1986 FIFA World Cup

sentences.title: 1986 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The tournament was the second to feature a 24-team format.

sentences.title: 1986 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: Colombia had been originally chosen to host the competition by FIFA but, largely due to economic reasons, was not able to do so, and resigned in November 1982.

sentences.title: 1986 FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: Mexico was selected as the new host in May 1983, and became the first country to host the World Cup more than once, after previously hosting the 1970 edition.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: The 2014 FIFA World Cup final was the final match of the 2014 World Cup, the 20th edition of FIFA's competition for national football teams.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: The match was played at the Maracanã Stadium in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on 13 July 2014, and was contested by Germany and Argentina.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: The event comprised hosts Brazil and 31 other teams who emerged from the qualification phase, organised by the six FIFA confederations.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: The 32 teams competed in a group stage, from which 16 teams qualified for the knockout stage.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: En route to the final, Germany finished first in Group G, with two wins and a draw, after which they defeated Algeria in the round of 16, France in the quarter-final and Brazil, by a score of 7–1, in the semi-final.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: Argentina finished first in Group F with three wins, before defeating Switzerland in the round of 16, Belgium in the quarter-final and the Netherlands in a penalty shoot-out in the semi-final.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup final
sentences.sentence_text: The final was witnessed by 74,738 spectators in the stadium, as well as over a billion watching on television, with the referee for the match being Nicola Rizzoli from Italy.

sentences.title: 2014 FIFA World Cup knockout stage

sentences.title: FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The FIFA World Cup, often called the World Cup, is an international association football competition among the senior men's national teams of the members of the Fédération Internationale de Football Association (FIFA), the sport's global governing body.

sentences.title: FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The tournament has been held every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, with the exception of 1942 and 1946 due to the Second World War.

sentences.title: FIFA World Cup
sentences.sentence_text: The reigning champions are Argentina, who won their third title at the 2022 World Cup by defeating France.

sentences.title: Sports fandom in the metaverse: marketing implications and research agenda
sentences.sentence_text: Abstract The metaverse is transforming how sports fans consume sports, express their fandom, and interact with sports brands representing professional sports leagues, teams and athletes.

sentences.title: Sports fandom in the metaverse: marketing implications and research agenda
sentences.sentence_text: However, scholars and practitioners lack an understanding of how sports brands can effectively appeal to their fans using the metaverse.

sentences.title: Sports fandom in the metaverse: marketing implications and research agenda
sentences.sentence_text: This conceptual study aims to address this gap by combining marketplace evidence and extant research through the lens of social identity theory.

sentences.title: Sports fandom in the metaverse: marketing implications and research agenda
sentences.sentence_text: The study suggests that sports brands should engage their fans in the metaverse by offering exclusive experiences that strengthen fans’ identification as a fan, facilitating opportunities for fans to demonstrate their fandom and reinforce their association with the fan community, and fostering immersive experiences that enable fans to interact with each other and the sports brand.

sentences.title: Sports fandom in the metaverse: marketing implications and research agenda
sentences.sentence_text: This study outlines several potential areas for future research based on three themes, namely experiences, personalization, and inclusivity.

sentences.title: Sports fandom in the metaverse: marketing implications and research agenda
sentences.sentence_text: By addressing these areas, sports brands can better understand and optimize their engagement strategies with fans using the metaverse.

sentences.sentence_text: This research was created by making use of the opinions of Twitter users about the Qatar 2022 World Cup, which has a great impact on the world.

sentences.title: THE EXCITEMENT OF FOOTBALL KICKS OFF IN QATAR: A SAMPLE OF TWITTER DATA ANALYSIS
sentences.sentence_text: This case study, which reflects a social reality such as the World Cup, was examined by an inductive method.

sentences.sentence_text: In order to achieve a more successful output in terms of more transparent and professional progress of the process, the MAXQDA program was preferred.

sentences.sentence_text: This research was structured in two sections.

sentences.title: THE EXCITEMENT OF FOOTBALL KICKS OFF IN QATAR: A SAMPLE OF TWITTER DATA ANALYSIS
sentences.sentence_text: Content analysis of 5,988 tweets posted in Turkish was conducted in the first section.

sentences.title: THE EXCITEMENT OF FOOTBALL KICKS OFF IN QATAR: A SAMPLE OF TWITTER DATA ANALYSIS
sentences.sentence_text: According to the data obtained from the tweets posted by the viewers under the theme "Qatar 2022 World Cup Overview", the first section consists of 4 categories, namely "Organization, Football Players, Countries, and Assessment", 36 codes, and 11 sub-codes.

sentences.title: THE EXCITEMENT OF FOOTBALL KICKS OFF IN QATAR: A SAMPLE OF TWITTER DATA ANALYSIS
sentences.sentence_text: Sentiment analysis of 79,574 tweets was conducted in the second section.

sentences.sentence_text: Users tweeted Positive (15,973), Slightly positive (30,533), Negative (3,228), Slightly negative (6,529), and Neutral (23,311) emotional tweets.

sentences.title: Does Employing Skilled Immigrants Enhance Competitive Performance? Evidence from European Football Clubs
sentences.sentence_text: We investigate the effect of employing skilled immigrants on the competitive performance of organizations by studying European football (soccer) clubs in Germany, Italy, France, England, and Spain from 1990-2020.Detailed microdata from this setting offers unusual transparency on the migration and hiring of talent and their contribution to collective performance.Further, countrylevel rules govern how immigrant players are defined and the number of immigrant players that clubs can deploy.Using changes to these rules as the basis for instrumental variables, we find that the number of immigrant players in the club's starting lineup has a positive local average treatment effect on the club's performance.We find evidence that immigrant players enhance club performance because they exhibit higher individual talent than natives and because they enable their clubs to deploy a wider variety of on-field strategies and actions.The latter mechanism is novel to the literature.

sentences.title: Football player ranking generated by multivariate methods

sentences.title: Football player ranking generated by multivariate methods

sentences.title: Football player ranking generated by multivariate methods
sentences.sentence_text: A total of 95 players were evaluated based on the variables: games played, wins, draws, losses, goals scored, yellow/red cards, awards, dream team, title in national leagues/ continental championships in a football club, title in world cups/ continental championship in a national team, Olympics gold medal.

sentences.title: Football player ranking generated by multivariate methods
sentences.sentence_text: We performed the multivariate clustering and principal components analyses.

sentences.title: Football player ranking generated by multivariate methods
sentences.sentence_text: The grouping technique resulted in three groups: regionally renowned players (Group 1), renowned players for their extraordinary performance (Group 2), and globally renowned players (Group 3).

sentences.title: Football player ranking generated by multivariate methods

sentences.sentence_text: The leaders of the ranking were Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo, Xavi, Pelé, and Iniesta.

sentences.title: Western Media Campaign against Qatar's Organization of the World Cup 2022: Appearances and Causes from the Point of View of Citizens and Residents in the State of Qatar
sentences.sentence_text: Hosting FIFA World Cup is considered a covet by many countries of the world, because of its importance and popularity and the great benefits accruing to the host country in all economic, political and cultural aspects.Qatar won the honor of hosting the 2022 World Cup in late 2010 with an official announcement from FIFA, and since then Qatar has been preparing for this exceptional tournament, which is being held for the first time in the Middle East.On the other hand, the Western media attacked Qatar and questioned its ability to host the tournament.This study aims to find out the manifestations and causes of the Western media's attack on the State of Qatar, against the backdrop of its hosting of the 2022 World Cup.To achieve this, the analytical survey method will be followed, with the questionnaire tool being employed on a random sample of citizens and residents in the State of Qatar.This study has theoretical and practical importance, as its theoretical importance lies in the fact that it provides a literary research contribution in two main fields: media studies and social sciences.As for its practical importance, it provides information and data that benefit the state institutions concerned with this media attack in the State of Qatar, with the aim of developing strategic plans for the media confrontation that are commensurate with the size of this media attack.One of the most important findings of the study is that the coverage of the World Cup in Qatar by Western media was predominantly negative.The newspapers most attacking Qatar during the period of hosting the 2022 World Cup were German newspapers, then followed by the French press, and then the British press.Also, one of the most prominent reasons behind the Western media attack on Qatar is the Western racist tendency towards the Arab and Islamic peoples.Finally, this study is considered one of the first studies that dealt with the phenomenon of Western media attacks on the State of Qatar during the period of hosting the 2022 FIFA World Cup, as the event is still exclusive and has not yet taken its time and space for study and analysis.Thus, we hope that this study will be the beginning of more research in this context.

sentences.title: The association between Saudi football clubs and the loyalty of their fanbase, a cross-sectional study.
sentences.sentence_text: This cross-sectional study analyzes the association between Saudi football clubs and the loyalty of their fanbase and evaluates how the fans are acting as consumers toward their football clubs.

sentences.title: The association between Saudi football clubs and the loyalty of their fanbase, a cross-sectional study.
sentences.sentence_text: Data was collected through a questionnaire.

sentences.title: The association between Saudi football clubs and the loyalty of their fanbase, a cross-sectional study.
sentences.sentence_text: The research was carried out on a sample of 2,317 participants.

sentences.title: The association between Saudi football clubs and the loyalty of their fanbase, a cross-sectional study.
sentences.sentence_text: The findings show that more than half of participants have attended a football match in the Saudi football league whereas 23.7% preferred to watch their favorite team in the stadium.

sentences.title: The association between Saudi football clubs and the loyalty of their fanbase, a cross-sectional study.
sentences.sentence_text: Furthermore, the loyalty of the fans can also be evaluated by the purchases of the club related products as the participants majority own their favorite club shirts where almost half of them have purchased another club’s products.

sentences.title: The association between Saudi football clubs and the loyalty of their fanbase, a cross-sectional study.
sentences.sentence_text: The limitations of the study that it is focused on limited behaviors of the fans and further investigations can be achieved to include what are the factors preventing the fans from being loyal to their football clubs or why they are not attending to the stadiums although they have showed the intention to.

sentences.title: A CULT CLASSIC: SNEAKER CULTURE AND ITS INFLUENCE ON CONSUMER BEHAVIOR
sentences.sentence_text: The purpose of the present study was to examine the idea that social media marketing done by sneaker companies create content that reinforces the feelings of identity and belonging to connect with their audience as an effective marketing strategy.

sentences.sentence_text: This study was meant to investigate the influence social media has in terms of marketing done by sneaker brands affect consumer engagement behaviors.

sentences.title: A CULT CLASSIC: SNEAKER CULTURE AND ITS INFLUENCE ON CONSUMER BEHAVIOR
sentences.sentence_text: There were two phases created for the methodology used in the study, including content analysis and deep dive analysis.

sentences.title: A CULT CLASSIC: SNEAKER CULTURE AND ITS INFLUENCE ON CONSUMER BEHAVIOR
sentences.sentence_text: The findings show that the type of marketing tactics used, design features implemented and the type of post that was used can determine the type of engagement the brand will receive.

sentences.title: Lionel Messi visits Vantara, experiences unforgettable encounters with sacred Indian traditions and wildlife conservation initiatives in India
sentences.sentence_text: JAMNAGAR, India, Dec. 20, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Global football icon Lionel Messi made a special visit to Vantara, a wildlife rescue, rehabilitation and conservation centre founded by Anant Ambani.

sentences.title: Lionel Messi visits Vantara, experiences unforgettable encounters with sacred Indian traditions and wildlife conservation initiatives in India
sentences.sentence_text: At the centre, initiatives traditionally begin with seeking blessings in accordance with Sanatana Dharma, which emphasises reverence for nature and respect for all living beings.

sentences.title: Lionel Messi visits Vantara, experiences unforgettable encounters with sacred Indian traditions and wildlife conservation initiatives in India
sentences.sentence_text: Messi's visit reflected this cultural ethos, as he participated in traditional Indian rituals, observed wildlife, and interacted with caregivers and conservation teams.

sentences.title: Lionel Messi visits Vantara, experiences unforgettable encounters with sacred Indian traditions and wildlife conservation initiatives in India
sentences.sentence_text: His engagements during the visit reflected the humility and humanitarian values for which he is widely recognised and highlighted the warm bond and friendship he shares with Anant Ambani, rooted in a shared commitment to wildlife conservation.

sentences.title: Sourav Ganguly files police complaint, sends legal notice after being dragged into Messi visit controversy
sentences.sentence_text: Sourav Ganguly has sent a Rs 50 crore defamation notice and filed a police complaint after being linked to the controversy surrounding Lionel Messi’s chaotic Kolkata visit during the GOAT India Tour 2025.

sentences.title: Sandesh Jhingan: All the people who were on the Messi tour, you will hardly see them at a national team game
